sentences.en: A kilogram of garlic sausage, please.
Add a crushed clove of garlic (= single section of it ).
Add the crushed garlic and remaining diced vegetables.
sentences.cn: 加入捣碎的大蒜和剩余的蔬菜丁。

sentences.en: At meal times the odour of sauerkrant vies with that of garlic.
sentences.cn: 吃饭的时候,德国泡菜的气味和大蒜的气味互相竟争着.

sentences.en: Boil the chick peas, add garlic and lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 把鹰嘴豆放在开水中煮，并加入大蒜和柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Cook pieces of succulent chicken with ample garlic and a little sherry.
sentences.cn: 烹饪鲜美滑嫩的鸡肉时多加些大蒜，并滴入少许雪利酒。

sentences.en: He likes to eat mutton which was seasoned with garlic.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢吃用大蒜调味的羊肉.
他的呼气中有大蒜气味.
他呼出的气中有大蒜味。

sentences.en: I've not been sparing with the garlic.
Leave each garlic clove in its papery skin.
sentences.cn: 每瓣蒜外面的薄皮都要留着。

sentences.en: The generous amount of garlic adds flavour.
There's a subtle hint of garlic in the sauce.
sentences.cn: 调味汁里稍微有一点蒜味.
